alert.note: Alert for Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:33PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN TISHOMINGO... NORTHEASTERN ALCORN...SOUTHEASTERN MCNAIRY AND SOUTHERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CST... At 433 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Corinth, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Pickwick Landing State Park, J P Coleman State Park, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Kossuth, Doskie, Pebble Hill, Hamburg, Wenasoga, Bruton Branch, Tulu, and Acton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
